ptserver.data

Class Tokenizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ptserver.data.Tokenizer

  • public class Tokenizer
extends java.lang.Object
    Tokenizer reads out tokens from the byte array.
    Since:
    Ptolemy II 10.0
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Anar Huseynov
    Accepted Rating:
    Red (ahuseyno)
    Proposed Rating:
    Red (ahuseyno)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tokenizer(byte[] payload)
      Create a new instance of the tokenizer with the specified payload.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Token getNextToken()
      Return the next token in the byte stream or null if there is none left.

      • Tokenizer

        public Tokenizer(byte[] payload)
        Create a new instance of the tokenizer with the specified payload.

    • Method Detail

      • getNextToken

        public Token getNextToken()
                   throws java.io.IOException,
                          IllegalActionException
        Return the next token in the byte stream or null if there is none left.
        Returns:
        the next token or null if there is none left
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a problem reading the byte stream
        IllegalActionException - if there is a problem loading a token handler
